WorkItem.Description:
Steps to reproduce:
Load up Rawr
Click "Load from Battle.net Armory"
Leave region as US
Realm: Llane
Character: Thoril
 
When mousing over any item I get the error below. Also I noticed that not all the upgrades were listed in the gear listing section.
 
I have performed the Suggested Fix and continue to receive this error. If I am posting this message without having performed the Suggested Fix I am aware that I am consuming the Developer(s) time in managing my Issue unnecessarily.
 
== Version: 4.1.2.0 ==
 
== Error Message ==
Object reference not set to an instance of an object.
 
== StackTrace ==
   at Rawr.RestoSham.CalculationsRestoSham.GetRelevantStats(Stats stats)

== These are the Steps that I have tried ==
I have tried re-downloading the package in case of corruption.
I loaded up a different character and it seemed to work fine. So it's probably something to do with my character or the items.
